alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 5:50PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds will impact portions of northeastern Cache and northern Rich Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 548 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers over Garden City, or 10 miles northwest of Laketown, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Randolph, Laketown, Garden City, Garden, Bear Lake, Meadowville, Pickelville, Beaver Mountain and Lakota. This includes the following highways... US Route 89 between mile markers 467 and 502. Utah Route 30 between mile markers 110 and 135. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
